00046 #include <Inventor/SbName.h>
00047 #include <Inventor/SbString.h>
00048 #include <Inventor/fields/SoField.h>
00049 #include <Inventor/nodes/SoNode.h>
00050 
00051 #include "CmdModifyParameter.h"
00052 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00053 #include "SceneModel.h"
00054 #include "tgf.h"
00055 
00062 CmdModifyParameter::CmdModifyParameter(  SoNode* node, QString parameterName, QString parameterValue, SceneModel* model, QUndoCommand* parent )
00063 :QUndoCommand( parent ),
00064  m_coinNode(  node ),
00065  m_newValue ( parameterValue ),
00066  m_oldValue( "" ),
00067  m_parameterName( parameterName ),
00068  m_pModel( model )
00069 {
00070         if( !m_coinNode )               tgf::SevereError( "CmdModifyParameter called with invalid node." );
00071 
00072         SoField* parameterField = m_coinNode->getField( SbName( m_parameterName.toStdString().c_str() ) );
00073         if( !parameterField )   tgf::SevereError( "CmdModifyParameter called with invalid parameterName." );
00074 
00075         SbString fieldValue;
00076         parameterField->get( fieldValue );
00077         m_oldValue = QString( fieldValue.getString() );
00078 
00079 
00080 }
00081 
00085 CmdModifyParameter::~CmdModifyParameter()
00086 {
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00094 void CmdModifyParameter::undo()
00095 {
00096         SoField* parameterField = m_coinNode->getField( m_parameterName.toStdString().c_str() );
00097         if( parameterField )    parameterField->set( m_oldValue.toStdString().c_str() );
00098 
00099 }
00100 
00105 void CmdModifyParameter::redo()
00106 {
00107 
00108         SoField* parameterField = m_coinNode->getField( m_parameterName.toStdString().c_str() );
00109         if( parameterField )
00110         {
00111                 parameterField->set( m_newValue.toStdString().c_str() );
00112         }
00113 
00114 }
